name: Impale
desc: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.

name: Ghost Shroud
desc: Necrophos slips into the realm that separates the living from the dead. Unable to attack or be attacked, he emits an aura that slows enemies around him. He takes additional magic damage in this form, but his restorative powers are amplified.

name: Bristleback
desc: Bristleback takes less damage if hit on the sides or rear.  If Bristleback takes 210 damage from the rear, he releases a Quill Spray of the current level.

name: Ice Armor
desc: Creates a shield around the target friendly unit or building, which adds armor and slows attacking units. Lasts 40 seconds.

name: Greater Bash
desc: Gives a chance to stun and knockback an enemy unit on an attack, as well as gaining bonus movement speed after a bash occurs. Deals a percentage of movement speed as damage.

name: Ravage
desc: Slams the ground, causing tentacles to erupt in all directions, damaging and stunning all nearby enemy units.

name: Arc Lightning
desc: Hurls a bolt of lightning that leaps through nearby enemy units.

name: Magic Missile
desc: Fires a magic missile at an enemy unit, stunning and dealing damage.

name: Static Storm
desc: Creates a damaging static storm that also silences all enemy units in the area for the duration.  The damage starts off weak, but increases in power over the duration.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Mana Drain
desc: CHANNELED - Absorbs the magical energies of a target enemy unit by taking mana from it every second.
